altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

altTitles.ja: 恋より青く

description.en:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.
description.ja: 好きなことが見つけられず、放課後を持て余す女子高生・高峯。ある日、電車内で落とした本を取り違えたことから読書好きの他校の生徒・咲倉と出会う。「本」を介した放課後のみの不思議な交流の中、高峯と咲倉はお互いに惹かれ始めていき――。友情でも恋愛でもない、ふたりだけの名前のない関係性を育む少女たちの青い春――。

altTitles.ja: 桜日梯子ファンブック

description.en: Fanbook of Sakurabi Hashigo

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

altTitles.ja: 白物語

description.en: A few days prior, mysterious disappearances had occurred in a certain karaoke parlor. There, part-timer Aoki Tokiya was involved in an even stranger incident. On the other hand, Midorima, who is investigating the incident, could not seem to pinpoint the target’s true identity.
description.ja: 想いが象（かたち）になるとき、世界が開かれる！九十九師VS妖怪、開戦！失踪事件が起こったカラオケ店。そこでバイトする青木時也はさらなる奇怪な事件に巻きこまれていく。事件の調査にやってきた九十九師・緑間の導きで九十九師となった時也は、緑間とともに物ノ怪と応戦する。だが、100人目の九十九師の誕生は九十九師全員のパワーバランスを崩し、時也は「禁忌の存在」として命を狙われてしまう！

description.en:
Yi-jae transmigrated as Hailey, the daughter of the Duke, who threw herself in the water just before her royal wedding.

However, Yi-jae can see vengeful spirits that should not be visible behind the King!
Days continue as Yi-jae struggles to exorcise the vengeful spirits that flock around King Roderick.

As Roderick spends more time with Yi-jae, he starts to notice the odd changes in his mental and physical self as they clear…

altTitles.ja: あんどろトリオ
Andro-Trio

description.en:
Aki Uchiyama, the writer who led the "bishojo" (beautiful girl) and "lolicon boom" in adult magazines, brought the flavor of his works published in adult magazines directly to boys' magazines in this extremely problematic work. Although the story is styled as a science fiction fantasy comedy about a pretty elementary school girl named Tsukasa, who is a test subject for strange inventions. She is made to wear underwear, diapers, and half-naked clothes, not to mention all the tricks she's played on. Perverse and erotic expressions are the main themes of the works. The author, Aki Uchiyama, also published an adult-oriented self-parody work, "Ankoro-Trio," at about the same time as this work.

While originally published as shonen, later prints are labeled for adults because the contents was considered harmful. [+18 don't tag as shonen]

altTitles.ja: ゲッコージョーレイ

description.en:
Gekko Iwasaki, a high-school student, is selected as executor of "Moonlight Ordinance" and fights against the residents. In this fairy tale, there is a world which is strangely affected by blue moonlight once in dozens of years. "Moonlight Ordinance" is a rule to restore the world to its former condition.   
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ufujitakazuhiro?lang=ja)

title.en: Henkyou Gurashi no Maou, Tensei shite Saikyou no Majutsushi ni naru

altTitles.ja: 辺境ぐらしの魔王、転生して最強の魔術師になる

altTitles.en: The Demon King of the Frontier Life, Reincarnated to Become the Strongest Mage

altTitles.ru: Владыка демонов из глубинки переродится и станет сильнейшим в мире магом!

altTitles.vi: Ma vương tái sinh trở thành pháp sư mạnh nhất

description.en:
There was once a mage called The Lone Demon King on the frontier. He was just a creature that never grew old, but was also loved by the villagers as something of a guardian deity. However, he was destroyed by a magic organization that sees his existence as dangerous. 200 years later, he is reincarnated as the second son of an aristocrat and obtains the strongest magic power.

"Let's pretend to be a human this time."

However, being a human lover, he didn't particularly think of revenge and has decided to pretend to be human in this life. In his past life, he was the guardian deity of a region, and in this life, he's a local aristocrat who lacks common sense. He doesn't know how to take it easy. As the second son of an aristocrat, he is loved by his family and friends, and while he is regarded as a master of magic in the magic guild, he becomes an 'Immortal Mage' behind the scenes.
description.ja: 生まれ持った強大な魔力を恐れられ「魔王」として討伐された魔術師・ディーン＝ノスフェラトゥ。200年後、男爵家の次男として目覚めたディーンは、膨大な魔力と前世の知識で最強魔術師として成り上がることに！
description.ru: Какие же сложные существа эти люди. К такому выводу пришёл вампир по имени Дин Носферату. Одни его гнали… Другие приняли. Одни его боготворят, другие охотятся за жизнью. Одни называют «Владыкой демонов», другие – «Ангелом-хранителем». Как с ними обращаться Дин не знал… поэтому совершил роковую ошибку и поплатился жизнью. Однако ему представился ещё один шанс – Дин Ноcферату переродился. И железно решил для себя кое-что – непременно досконально изучит существ, зовущихся «человечество», и не вкусит повторно горечь болезненного опыта!
description.vi:
Có một ma pháp sư được mệnh danh là Ma vương độc tôn ở vùng biên giới. Anh ta là một sinh vật không bao giờ già đi, nhưng lại nhận được sự yêu quý của dân làng tựa như một vị thần hộ mệnh. Tuy nhiên, một tổ chức ma pháp đã coi anh ta là mối nguy hiểm và đã tiêu diệt anh. 200 năm sau, anh tái sinh làm con trai thứ hai của một quý tộc và trở thành ma pháp sư mạnh nhất.
“Lần này hãy giả vờ là một người bình thường!”
Là một người yêu con người, anh ta không nghĩ đến việc trả thù và đã quyết định giả vờ làm người bình thường trong kiếp này.
Kiếp trước, anh là thần hộ mệnh của một vùng, kiếp này, anh là một quý tộc địa phương, nhưng anh không biết những đạo lý đời thường, không biết làm sao cho nó trở nên dễ dàng hơn.
Là con trai thứ hai của một quý tộc, anh được gia đình và bạn bè yêu quý, trong khi đó, anh cũng được tôn thành bậc thầy ma pháp trong hội ma pháp, anh trở thành một ‘Immortal Mage’ một cách bí mật.

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

title.en: Shokuba no Onnanoko ni Toushisuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 職場の女の子に投資する話

altTitles.en: A Story About Investing in a Girl at the Workplace

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre investir em uma garota no local de trabalho

description.en:
Hatamoto Ikuto, the manager of the local bookstore "BOOK FOREST", is an otaku who can't resist spending money on his favorite characters in games.
Todoroki Miran, the part-time leader, looks up to him but can't understand his obsession with spending on in-game things.
When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?"
As the two navigate a cycle of investment and returns, the distance between their hearts begins to shrink.
A unique and charming investment-themed romantic comedy!

(Source: Melonbooks, edited)
description.ja: 街の書店「BOOK FOREST」で店長を務める畑本育人は、ゲームの「推し」キャラに課金してしまうオタク気質。バイトリーダーの轟ミランは、店長に憧れるものの、データに課金することだけは理解できない。「オレにとって課金は投資だ」と話す育人に、「それならあたしにも投資…して?」と話すミランだが…。投資と還元を繰り返し、2人の心の距離が揺れ動く――新感覚の投資ラブコメ！
description.pt-br:
Hatamoto Ikuto, gerente da livraria local “BOOK FOREST”, é um otaku que não resiste a gastar dinheiro com seus personagens favoritos dos jogos.
Todoroki Miran, líder de meio período, o admira, mas não consegue entender sua obsessão por gastar em coisas de jogos.
Quando Ikuto afirma: “Para mim, gastar dinheiro é um investimento”, Miran provoca: “Se é assim, que tal você investir em mim...?”
Enquanto os dois navegam em um ciclo de investimentos e retornos, a distância entre seus corações começa a diminuir.
Uma comédia romântica única e encantadora com tema de investimento!

altTitles.ja: ナルト
-ナルト-
NARUTO -ナルト-

altTitles.th: นินจาคาถาโอ้โฮเฮะ

description.bg: Тайното село Коноха. Проблемният възпитаник на Нинджа академията Наруто и днес не спира с белите! Огромната мечта на същия този Наруто е да приеме званието на историческия герой Хокаге и да стане нинджа, като надмине всички предишни Хокаге. Ала около раждането на Наруто изглежда витае една тайна...!?
description.cs: Stát se nejlepším nindžou na světě není věc snadná, dokonce ani když nejste obecně zatracovaný outsider, který má v sobě zapečetěného devítiocasého démona, jenž kdysi málem srovnal se zemí celou nindžovskou vesnici. Naruto je však pevně odhodlaný splnit si tento sen a vzdát se za žádných okolností nehodlá. Nejspíš proto, že neví, co to slovo znamená (a prakticky určitě ho nedokáže správně napsat).
description.de: Naruto ist ein berüchtigter Tunichtgut in seinem Dorf, das fast ausschließlich aus Ninja besteht. Er liebt Nudelsuppe und spielt anderen gern Streiche. So ist es kein Wunder, dass er nicht gerade beliebt ist. Doch gerade deshalb will er der beste Ninja seines Dorfes werden. Zu diesem Zweck gehen er und seine Mitschüler Sasuke und Sakura beim großen Meister Kakashi in die Lehre...
description.en:
Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja.  


---
description.es:
En la Villa Oculta de la Hoja, un chaval de lo más problemático que estudia en la escuela de ninjas, Naruto, se dedica a urdir gamberrada tras gamberrada. El sueño de Naruto es el de llegar un día a heredar el nombre de Hokage, reservado a los grandes héroes, y de convertirse en el mejor ninja de todos los tiempos. ¿¡Podrá Naruto llegar a cumplir sus anhelos de grandeza...!?

---
La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.fi:
Konohan ninjakylässä ilman vanhempia varttunut Naruto Uzumaki on ninjakoulun heikoimpia oppilaita. Mutta Narutossa piilee voimia, jotka ylittävät inhimilliset rajat... Naruto on vauhdikas seikkailutarina ninjanuorukaisesta ja hänen ystävistään, taisteluista, toveruudesta ja kunniasta. Sekä kotimaassaan että ulkomailla huippusuosittu sarja pohjautuu taruihin Japanin historian mystisistä ninjasotureista. 

Sarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille.
description.fr: Naruto est un garçon un peu spécial. Il est toujours tout seul et son caractère fougueux ne l'aide pas vraiment à se faire apprécier dans son village. Malgré cela, il garde au fond de lui une ambition: celle de devenir un maître Hokage, la plus haute distinction dans l'ordre des ninjas, et ainsi obtenir la reconnaissance de ses pairs.
description.id: Ini adalah Desa Konohagakure... Naruto adalah salah satu murid di Akademi Ninja yang suka berbuat onar!! Impian Naruto adalah menjadi seorang Hokage. Tetapi, Naruto memiliki rahasia sejak lahir karena di dalam tubuhnya terdapat siluman rubah yang disegel! Inilah petualangan Naruto untuk mewujudkan impiannya...
description.it:
"Naruto" è incentrato sulle avventure di un ragazzino, Uzumaki Naruto, che vuole diventare un famoso ninja e lasciare un segno nella storia. Gli ostacoli sul suo cammino sono però molti, come le prove che dovrà sostenere e i rivali che dovrà affrontare...

---
Naruto Uzumaki è un ragazzo dodicenne del Villaggio della Foglia che insegue il sogno di diventare Hokage, cioè il ninja più forte, nonché capo del villaggio. Il giovane custodisce in sé un segreto di cui lui stesso è all'oscuro: all'interno del suo corpo è sigillato un demone, conosciuto come Volpe a Nove Code, che attaccò il villaggio dodici anni prima e fu sigillato dal Quarto Hokage in cambio della vita. Per questo motivo, Naruto è stato sempre associato allo spirito demoniaco ed è cresciuto isolato da tutti. Dopo l'ennesima bocciatura di Naruto all'esame dell'accademia per il diploma di Genin, il suo maestro Iruka Umino lo salva dal maestro traditore Mizuki che lo aveva spinto a rubare un rotolo contenente delle tecniche proibite. In questo frangente, Naruto scopre finalmente il suo segreto. Questo, unito al desiderio di salvare Iruka, gli dà la spinta necessaria a sconfiggere Mizuki con la Tecnica Superiore della Moltiplicazione del Corpo, appresa dal rotolo. Grazie a questa dimostrazione di coraggio, il ragazzo riesce a guadagnarsi la promozione a Genin ed entra a far parte della Squadra 7 insieme a Sakura Haruno e Sasuke Uchiha, sotto la guida del maestro Kakashi Hatake.
description.ja: ここは木ノ葉隠れの里。忍術学校の問題児、ナルトは今日もイタズラ三昧！！　そんなナルトのでっかい夢は歴代の勇者、火影の名を受けついで、先代を越える忍者になることだ。だがナルトには出生の秘密が…！？
description.pl: Osada Konoha-gakure. Naruto, uczeń szkoły dla ninja, rozrabia jak tylko potrafi! Mimo to, jego marzeniem jest pokonanie "Hokage", czyli aktualnego przywódcy wojowników. Gdy Naruto się rodził, wydarzyło się coś, o czym on sam wciąż jeszcze nie wie...
description.pt: La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.ru: Двенадцать лет назад, мощный Девятихвостый Демон-Лис напал на деревню ниндзя, Коноху. Демон был быстро побежден и запечатан в младенце по имени Наруто Узумаки. Но для этого, главному ниндзя Конохи, четвёртому хокаге пришлось пожертвовать жизнью… Теперь, по прошествии 12-и лет, Наруто является номером один среди придурков ниндзя, который полон решимости стать следующим Хокаге и получить признание всех, кто когда-либо сомневался в нем!
description.sr: Jedan od najpopularnijih naslova širom sveta sada je konačno dostupan i domaćim čitaocima. Serijal prati avanture dečaka Naruta, koji pokušava da postane veliki ratnik i nadmaši sve prethodnike. Ali moraće najpre da se bori sa samim sobom.
description.tr:
Naruto, ünlü mangaka Masaşi Kişimoto tarafından yaratılan, 1999 yılından beri Japonya’da yayınlanan dünyaca ünlü manga serisi artık Türkiye’de.

Bugüne kadar Japonya’da 100 milyondan fazla satan Naruto serisi, 2002 yılında bu başarısı taçlandırarak animeye uyarlandı. Ülkemizde de gösterilen bu anime, manga kültürünü dünyaya tanıtıp; Naruto’yu dünyadaki en önemli mangalardan biri haline getirdi. Yıllardan beri geniş bir hayran kitlesi tarafından Türkçe’de yayınlanması beklenen bu eser, manganın özünden hiçbir şey kaybetmemesine özen gösterilerek ve Japonya’da olduğu gibi sağdan sola okunacak biçimde hazırlandı. Yediden yetmişe herkese hitap eden Naruto, çizgi roman kültürü ile ilgili olmayanların bile severek okuyabileceği bir eser.
description.uk: Дванадцять років тому, потужний Дев'ятихвостий Демон-Лис напав на селище Коноху. Демон був швидко переможений і запечатаний в дитинку на ім'я Наруто Узумакі. Але для цього, головному ніндзя Конохи, четвертому хокаге довелося пожертвувати життям... Тепер, після 12-и років, Наруто є номером один серед ніндзя, який сповнений рішучості стати наступним Хокаґе та отримати визнання всіх, хто коли-небудь сумнівався в ньому!

altTitles.en: I Will Politely Decline the Male Lead!

altTitles.mn: Би эелдэгээр эрэгтэй гол дүрээс татгалзах болно!

altTitles.ja: 男主人公は丁重にお断りします！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我會禮貌地拒絕男主角

description.en:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends… it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality… But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind… to live!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)

description.fr:
Condamnée à mourir le jour de ses 20 ans puis à ressusciter encore et toujours pour l'éternité, c'est là, sa malédiction. Mais quitte à voir son avenir ruiné, autant vivre comme on le souhaite! La méchante est bien décidée à suivre cet adage et a changé l'histoire du roman où elle se trouve. L'héroïne, sa rivale? Plus question! Elle est tellement adorable, plutôt en faire sa meilleure amie! Le fiancé? Un prince héritier cruel et idiot, mieux vaut l'éliminer du paysage. Cependant, à chacune de ses décisions s'éloignant de l'histoire originale, le futur se modifie. Jusqu'où va-t-elle bouleverser le cours du roman et tous ses personnages?

---

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.ko:
비참하게 처형당하는 소설의 악역으로 빙의했다.
사망플래그를 피하기 위해 별짓 다 해봤지만, 돌아오는 건 결국 죽음뿐.
세 번째 회귀하던 날, 나는 결심했다.
막 살기로!

“이렇게 살아도 죽고, 저렇게 살아도 살해당하는 판에
나 하고 싶은 대로 하고 살겠다!”

그러나 원작에서 너무 멀어진 탓일까.
원래대로라면 원작 여주에게 향했어야 할 남주들의 관심이
어째서인지 나한테 향하는 것 같다……?

---

description.uk:
Вона стала лиходійкою в романі, якій судилося жалісна смерть. У своєму першому житті вона пішла за оригінальною історією і померла. Потім знову прокинулась в тілі лиходійки. Під час наступної спроби вона робила все, щоб уникнути смерті, але врешті-решт її знову чекала лише вона.
Як би я не жила, все одно помру, чи не краще жити так, як хочеться?
Проте, щось я надто далеко відійшла від оригінального сюжету. Чому раптом головний герой зацікавився мною?...

---

description.zh-hk:
她在一部小說中被當作惡棍附身，在小說中被悲慘地處決。

我嘗試了一切來避免死亡標誌，但最終，只有死亡浮出水面。在第三次回歸的那天，我下定了決心。讓我們活下去吧！

"如果我這樣生活，我會死，如果我那樣生活，我會被殺！"

但這是因為它離原版太遠了嗎？主角對原版女主角的興趣似乎以某種方式針對了我......？

So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

I'm Using the Hero Who Loves Me Too Much, Because I Planned to Live a Long Life in This World (I Probably Failed Again)

description.en:
Lisette, the daughter of an earl, is destined to be killed and eaten by a monster on her 20th birthday.
She is currently living her fourth life with all her memories intact.

In order to live longer this time, she goes to live in a sanctuary (the countryside) where monsters do not appear, but one day she reunites with Ralph, the handsome son of an aristocrat.

He is the young man whom Lisette saved when he was an orphan in her childhood.
The first words he says to her are, "I lived for you."

The first volume of a fantasy about a heroine who fights against her fate of death and a submissive, high-spec yandere hero, a devoted and doting love story!

For Paula, not a single day passed by without a reminder of her ugliness. But it was her hideous face that spared her from being sold to a brothel or dying tragically like her sisters. So when Paula's father sells her off to work at an esteemed nobleman's mansion, she realizes that peasant girls are a disposable resource. However, she finds the young Count Belunita tucked away in an annex, shamefully hidden from the curious eyes of the public. And as Paula struggles to appeal to her tyrannical master's whims, she must also embrace her role as his secret maid.

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合
私の愛したツバメ

description.en:
When Wakana saw him for the first time, he was captivated. From what others had heard, Tsubame was rumored to be a Mistress.
He was supposed to be someone "not normal," someone from a different world. The more talked to him, the more uneasy Wakana felt at his smiling and troubled expressions.
But the glimpse of their "lover" relationship that Tsubame had given Wakana's heart was filled with jealousy...!?

‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

altTitles.ja: モブ同然の悪役令嬢は男装して攻略対象の座を狙う

altTitles.en: The Villainess Who Is No Better than an Extra Cross-Dresses to Be a Love Interest

description.en:
「That's right. I can become a potential love interest as well.」A ray of inspiration strikes, in an otome game where men are treated favorably, the side-villainess starts a crossdressing revolution!?

The world is unfair. Just because I am an extra villainess, I'm doomed to always face the bad ending... If that's the case, can't I just dress up as a man and capture the heart of the game's heroine by becoming a potential love interest and live happily ever after?

The fiancé with the temper of a kid; the tsundere classmate; the puppy-like brother-in-law; and the beautiful icy-hearted prince, they are all my rivals. Just wait and watch, you handsome heartthrobs! I, Elizabeth Burton, will become a seductive knight who'd softly whisper love and capture the hearts of maidens with a mischievous wink! 

A heartwarming school romance comedy, where a crossdressing lady aims to become a noble and a fabulous love interest, begins!

title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

altTitles.ja: 銀河英雄伝説

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

title.en: Net no "Oshi" to Real no "Oshi" ga Tonari ni Hikkoshite Kita

altTitles.ja: ネットの『推し』とリアルの『推し』が隣に引っ越してきた

altTitles.en: My Fave Persons Moved into Condominium Where I Live

description.en:
**The only one who can support them is... me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols." His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber. His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress. Souma's university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols... But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!? Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol...
description.ja: 無為な日々を過ごす天童蒼馬には二人の『推し』がいる。ネットの『推し』大人気VTuberのアンリエッタ。リアルの『推し』アイドル声優の八住ひより。二人への推し活を生きがいに大学生活を送るはずが……なんと隣の部屋に『推し』の一人が引っ越してきて!?夢のような展開に胸を躍らせる蒼馬だったが、目の当たりにしたのは残念すぎる『推し』の本性で――。
description.vi: Vtuber nhà rác... Seiyuu Idol bợm rượu... Bạn thuở nhỏ Yandere... Ai sẽ là người chiến thắng

description.en: From a young age, Minami Harusumi has had recurring dreams of Veronica, a princess whose kingdom is on the verge of destruction. He believes them to be recollections of his past life, and that he is her reincarnation. Because of this, he is ridiculed by his classmates. One day, when the mockery escalates into bullying, he rediscovers magic—something Veronica had studied and used. Reassured his past life is not merely a fantasy, Minami tries to learn more about his past memories and the reason behind them…

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn't make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl. Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her "The class's second cutest girl" behind her back. On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, "the cutest girl in class's" invitation just to hang out in my house with me. Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59139)
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.ja:
「じゃあ、内緒の友達ってことで――」

クラスでぼっちな俺・前原真樹に、初めてできた友だち・朝凪海。いつも輪の中心にいて、他の男子からは『クラスで２番目に可愛い』なんて陰で噂されている。ぼっちの俺なんかと住む世界が違う――と思いきや、まさかのＢ級映画好き!? ひょんなことから友だちになった朝凪さんは、金曜日の放課後だけこっそり俺の家に遊びに来る。映画にゲーム、漫画の趣味も合う彼女との楽しいひととき。
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

altTitles.en: I Don't Know if it's Love or Like!

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
*“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es:
*"Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".*

De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.
description.fr: Oscar, prince héritier du grand royaume de Farsas, se rend chez Tinasha, la sorcière la plus puissante du continent, pour lever une malédiction dont il est victime depuis sa jeunesse, qui l’empêche d’avoir des enfants. Lorsqu’il passe l’épreuve de la “Tour de la sorcière”, qui lui donne le droit à n’importe quel souhait, il demande alors la main de Tinasha !
description.ja:
呪われた王と最強の魔女が紡ぐ、【愛】と【呪い】の一大叙事詩が開幕！

このライトノベルがすごい！2020（宝島社刊）にて単行本部門とノベルズ部門でダブル１位となった伝説的ＷＥＢノベルが待望のコミック化！

永い時を生き、絶大な力で災厄を呼ぶ異端――魔女。
強国ファルサスの王太子・オスカーは、幼い頃に受けたある呪いを解くために、世界最強と名高い「青き月の魔女」のもとを訪れる。
“魔女の塔”の試練を乗り越えて契約者となったオスカーだが彼が望んだのは……。

title.en: Kuromaku Ikka ni Tensei Shita Kedo Gensaku Mushishite Dokuritsu Suru

altTitles.ja: 黒幕一家に転生したけど原作無視して独立する

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Into a Villainous Family, but I'm Ignoring the Plot and Going Rogue!
I Was Reincarnated Into a Villainous Family, but I'll Ignore the Original Story and Live Independently

description.en:
The protagonist, who has been reincarnated into the world of a game he played extensively, has become Yuri, the third son of a villainous family!!

His father, siblings, and the entire household are the worst and most ruthless, all doomed to be brutally massacred.
As for Yuri himself, he is destined to betray the Hero as the final boss, dragging the heroine down with him to meet the worst possible death.

Not wanting to die, he decides to completely distance himself from both his villainous family and the Hero’s party, intending to live a peaceful and carefree life… Or so he thought, but now, one by one, the original story’s characters keep gathering around him…!?

From a self-declared "exile", the lone Final Boss’s journey of independence and unrivaled strength begins!!!

___
* Alternative Raw: [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71281)
description.ja:
やり込んだゲームの世界に転生した主人公は
黒幕ファミリーの三男・ユーリになっていた！！

父や兄姉ともに最悪＆最凶の一家は、いずれ惨殺される運命。
ユーリに至ってはラスボスとして勇者を裏切り、ヒロインを道連れにして最悪の死に方をする。

死ぬのはごめんなので、黒幕一家とも勇者パーティーとも無関係に、ぬくぬく暮らす…
はずなのに、原作キャラたちがどんどん俺のもとに集まってくるんだが…!?

自主的『追放』宣言から始まる
はぐれラスボスの独立無双譚、スタート！！！

title.en: The Strange Adventure of a Broke Mercenary

altTitles.ja: 食い詰め傭兵の幻想奇譚
Fantasie Geshichte von soldner in groBer Armut

altTitles.en: The Strange Fantasy Story Of A Broke Mercenary

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการผจญภัยสุดประหลาดของนายทหารถังแตก

altTitles.de: Fantasie Geschichte eines Söldners in Armut

description.en:
After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)

title.en: A Good-Natured Craftsman Leisurely Travels Through Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ohitoyoshi Shokunin no Burari Isekai Tabi

altTitles.ja: お人好し職人のぶらり異世界旅

description.en: Ryoichi Ishikawa, a young man who lost his father, who was his only relative, also decided to close the electrical shop that he and his father had been working on. From a strange matter, I choose to transfer to another world by my own will. It was supposed to be the second life of a leisurely trip, but I can not leave a person in need. We solve many worries by making full use of the cheat skills given by God and the skills of a craftsmen. Sometime around, friends with one or two habits gathered…! ?The journey of a good-natured craftsman in another world begins here!
description.ja:
唯一の肉親だった父を亡くし、父と二人で切り盛りしていた電気工事店も閉店する事になってしまった青年、石川良一。
ひょんな事から、自らの意思で異世界転移する事を選択する。
ぶらり旅する第二の人生……のはずだったが、困っている人は放っておけない。
神様から授かった数々のチートスキルと、職人としての技術を駆使してお悩み解決。
いつしか周りには一癖も二癖もある仲間たちが集まってきて…！？
お人好しな職人のドタバタ異世界旅、ここに開幕！

altTitles.en: Older Sister Yuki is a Sensual Girl

altTitles.ja: ゆき姉ちゃんの官能ごっこ

description.en:
In his first year at high school, Shin Yuki harbors a secret affection for someone—Yukino Kurose, an older, book-loving classmate with a captivating figure. Unbeknownst to him, she harbors a scandalous pastime: recreating steamy scenes from erotic literature through playful role-play.

As Shin stumbles upon Yukino's secret, he finds himself entangled in her daring impersonation games... or does he?

This is the exhilarating coming-of-age story of their youthful desires and the thrilling "adult play" between the literary girl and her mischievous friend.

(Source: Ganma+, edited)
description.ja:
ピカピカの高校１年生・結城晋には好きな人がいる。それは、本が好きで地味でオッパイが大きい年上の幼なじみ・黒瀬雪乃だ。しかし、地味な文学少女だと思っていた雪乃には秘密があった。それは「官能小説のエッチなシーンを真似」という、ヤらしすぎる"ごっこ遊び"だった!!
そんな彼女の秘密を知った晋は、知りたがりすぎる雪乃のごっこ遊びに巻き込まれていき...!!?

こんな青春送りたかった!! 文学少女で地味なあの娘とナイショの"大人のごっこ遊び"♪

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman Revenge

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件: クレイマン Revenge

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Clayman's Revenge

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Месть Клеймана

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسد فيه كسلايم: انتقام كلايمان

altTitles.tr: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman'in İntikamı

altTitles.uk: Про моє переродження в слиз: Помста Клеймана

description.en: Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?
description.ja: ワルプルギスに響き渡った断末魔。道化の夢は一度は尽きたかと思われた。しかし運命のイタズラか、世界の選択か、死んだはずのクレイマンは復活し、再び暗躍を始め･･･る？
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff es una historia alternativa que sucede luego de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera.

Historia alternativa que continua despues de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera. - El Walpurgis habia terminado con el grito de su muerte. Parecia que el sueño del arlequin habia llegado a su fin. Sin embargo, ya sea por una broma del destino o una decisión del mundo, Clayman quien supuestamente murio, ha resucitado una vez mas. ¿Es el comienzo de una nueva era oscura...?

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

description.en: Official Hetalia AU. "This world, although similar to the one we know of, is just slightly different. Data-wise, it's pretty much the same thing, just a lot more punk and grunge-like this time. 200 crowded districts, each with a unique culture and history of their own, each with a boss in charge, in a spinning circle of harmony and chaos. Yet a new disruption was about to arise."

After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
description.ko:
바다에 빠져 실종된 후, 무인도에서 7년 만에 살아 돌아온 우영장의 좌충우돌 문명 적응기!
그의 몸은 단단한 근육질로 변했고 온갖 동물과의 의사소통은 물론, 특별한 능력까지 구사하며 사건사고가 끊이질 않는다.
과연 영장은 밀림보다 무섭다는 도시에서 살아남을 수 있을까?

altTitles.en: Once Again Into the Light, Alone

altTitles.fr: Encore une fois sous la lumière

altTitles.pt: Mais uma vez até a luz

altTitles.th: องค์หญิงผู้หวนคืนสู่แสงสว่าง

altTitles.ja: もう一度、光の中へ

description.en:
I was falsely accused of attempting to kill my younger sister, who was worshipped as a holy maiden. There was not a single person who believed in me, nor was there a person who stood up for me. Not even my blood-related family. I was fourteen years old, and it was winter. I, who was Edenbell's Fourth Princess, was miserably beheaded in front of the masses. After the end of my death, I awoke and what came was...

"My baby, my precious younger sister."

With a delightful smile, he held my small fingers. That warm gesture, warmth, and touch. He sang me a lullaby as he held me gently and swayed.

---
When Princess Alisa is framed for a terrible crime, she is shocked to learn that her own family wants her executed. After losing her will to live, she finds herself reborn as the princess of a rival empire. And though her new family acts sweet and kind on the surface, she's not sure they can be truly trusted. Luckily, with this new life comes new power. But what exactly is this mysterious magic that awakens in her? And more importantly, can she use it to get vengeance against those who once betrayed her?

---

description.fr:
Alyssa, la quatrième princesse d’Edenbell, est accusée à tort d’avoir tenté de tuer sa petite sœur. Condamnée froidement à mort par sa famille, elle se réincarne comme princesse de l’empire rival, Elmir. Dégoutée par la trahison de ses proches, elle jure de ne plus jamais aimer qui que ce soit. Mais l’empire d’Elmir est bien différent de celui d’Edenbell… Dans ce nouvel environnement, parviendra-t-elle à retrouver foi en l'humanité et à découvrir les terribles secrets qui entourent son exécution?

---
Personne n’a cru en moi, personne n’était là pour me soutenir, même ma propre famille. A ce moment-là, j’étais Alyssa, 4e princesse d’Edenbell. J’étais dans un état épouvantable et j’avais la gorge asséchée par la soif. J’ai regardé ma sœur cadette, espérant qu’elle les empêcherait de me tuer. Mais ce que j’ai vu sur son visage, c’était une expression d’extase, elle était heureuse d’assister à ma mort. Après avoir été exécutée, j’ai ouvert de nouveau mes yeux. J’étais dans le ventre de quelqu’un et je pouvais entendre des voix. Avant de retomber dans l’inconscience, j’ai entendues les paroles d’un petit garçon:

«Bienvenue, ma précieuse petite sœur,» il a ri chaleureusement, «Le monde entier t’aime.»

Je me suis réincarnée en tant que première princesse de l’empire Elmir, le rival de l’empire Edenbell!

---

description.id:
Aku dituduh mau membunuh adikku sendiri yang mendapat julukan sebagai saintess. Tidak ada seorang pun yang percaya denganku, dan tidak ada seorang pun yang melindungiku. Bahkan keluarga kandungku sendiri tidak mau mendengarkan penjelasanku sedikit pun. Pada akhirnya, aku yang merupakan putri ke-4 kekaisaran Edenberr mengakhiri hidupku dengan cara yang sadis pada usia 14 tahun. Setelah kehidupan pertamaku berakhir, saat aku membuka mata... "Sayang, adikku yang manis." Ada yang memanggilku dengan hangat. Dia memegang tanganku yang mungil sambil tersenyum. Aku bisa merasakan kehangatan darinya. Dia menggendongku sambil menyanyikan lagu tidur untukku.

---

description.it:
Quando la principessa Alicia viene incastrata per un terribile crimine, rimane scioccata nell'apprendere che la sua stessa famiglia vuole che sia giustiziata. Dopo aver perso la voglia di vivere, si ritrova a rinascere come la principessa di un impero rivale. E sebbene la sua nuova famiglia si comporti in modo dolce e gentile in superficie, non è sicura che ci si possa veramente fidare di loro. Fortunatamente, con questa nuova vita arriva un nuovo potere. Ma cos'è esattamente questa misteriosa magia che si risveglia in lei? E, cosa più importante, può usarla per vendicarsi di coloro che una volta l'hanno tradita?

---

description.ja:
イデンベル帝国の皇女アリサには腹違いの妹マリアンヌがいた。 金色の瞳を持ち誰からも愛される華やかな妹に対し、アリサは使用人にも冷遇を受けていた。 アリサがマリアンヌをお茶に招待した日、突然マリアンヌが血を吐き倒れる。 家族からも嫉妬したアリサが毒を入れたと決めつけられ、アリサは死刑になる。この濡れ衣はマリアンヌの陰謀だった。 もう人間には生まれ変わりたくないと神に願ったが、アリサはライバル国・エルミール帝国の皇女アイシャとして転生してしまう。 前世と正反対の愛情深い家族。特に腹違いの兄・イシスにやすらぎを感じ次第に心を開いて行く。 精霊使いの能力を持ち、賢く優しい少女へと成長するアイシャは、前世の残酷な記憶を乗り越え再び光の中で輝けるのか!?

Селена. Хранительница Империи. Богиня луны и мести... Неужели у меня не будет шанса отыскать справедливость и отомстить? Если так, то поскорее убейте меня. И прошу... Пускай впредь я больше никогда не появлюсь на свет человеком. Чтобы больше не сталкиваться с предательством. Чтобы избежать жизни, в которой ни единая живая душа тебя не любит. Чтобы больше не влачить жалкое существование.

description.sk:
Keď je princezná Alisa obvinená z hrozného zločinu, je šokovaná, keď sa dozvie, že jej vlastná rodina chce, aby ju popravili. Cíti sa porazená a ocitne sa znovuzrodená ako princezná znepriatelenej ríše. A hoci jej nová rodina pôsobí na povrchu milo a láskavo, nie je si istá, že sa im dá skutočne dôverovať. Našťastie s týmto novým životom prichádza nová sila. Ale čo presne je to tajomné kúzlo, ktoré sa v nej prebúdza? A čo je dôležitejšie, dokáže to využiť na pomstu tým, ktorí ju kedysi zradili?

description.en:
Hyakkaou Private Academy. An institution for the privileged with a very peculiar curriculum. You see, when you're the sons and daughters of the wealthiest of the wealthy, it's not athletic prowess or book smarts that keep you ahead. It's reading your opponent, the art of the deal. What better way to hone those skills than with a rigorous curriculum of gambling?  
At Hyakkaou Private Academy, the winners live like kings, and the losers are put through the wringer. But when Yumeko Jabami enrolls, she's gonna teach these kids what a high roller really looks like!

---
Placed 3rd in the DaVinchi x NicoNico Tsugi 2016 Manga Awards.  
  
---
Original concept: <http://ushimilk.web.fc2.com/index.html>
description.kk: Хьяккау жекеменшік академиясы - Тек ерекше, элита өкілдер оқитын жер. Оқудағы жетістіктер, спорттық жетістіктер... мұнда ешкім бұған қызықпайды. Құмар ойындарды қаншалықты жақсы меңгергеніңіз табыстың белгісі. Жеңіске жет - оқу саған жұмақ сияқты болып көрінеді. Ал жеңілгендер ше? Бұл туралы айтпаған жөн. Дәл осы академияға Джиябами Юмеко есімді қыз ауыстырылды. Бұл неге әкеліп соғады?
description.pt: Academia Privada Hyakkaou. Uma instituição para os privilegiados com um currículo muito peculiar. Por exemplo, quando você é o filho e a filha dos mais ricos, não são façanhas atléticas ou livros que te deixam na frente. É lendo o seu oponente, a arte da negociação. Que outro jeito melhor de afiar essas habilidades do que com um rigoroso currículo de jogos? Na Academia Privada Hyakkaou, os vencedores vivem como reis, e os perdedores são colocados através do espremedor. Mas quando Jabami Yumeko aparece, ela vai ensinar essas crianças como um grande jogador é!
description.ru: Частная академия Хьяккау – место, где учится так называемая элита. Успехи в учебе, спортивные достижения… здесь это никого не интересует. Насколько ты хорош в азартных играх – вот признак успешности. Выигрывай, и учеба покажется тебе раем. Что с проигравшими? Лучше об этом не упоминать. И именно в эту академию переводится девушка - Джиябами Юмеко. К чему это приведет?

description.fr:
Seoljin est un vrai loser à l'école : il est méprisé par tous, même par ceux qu'il croyait être ses amis. La seule chose qu'il puisse faire pour échapper à cette dure réalité, c'est de lire des webtoons d'action, de s'imaginer à la place des héros qui se battent courageusement contre leurs adversaires, sans la moindre hésitation. Mais la vie de Seoljin va prendre un tout autre tournant lorsqu'il laissera un petit commentaire sur le webtoon "Player" : un commentaire qui, bientôt, le conduira dans l'univers-même de ce webtoon !

description.zh:
弱鸡少年穿越到漫画世界！
打败NO.1才能回到现实？
内向的男主许镇是学校里的边缘人物。作为一个漫画迷，某天他看到一部漫画，却很反感故事里主角先被强者碾压再崛起的老套设定。于是在评论中留言吐槽并许下了“承诺”，没想到这条评论成为了热评第一。之后不可思议的事情发生了！他竟被漫画里的“神——亚瑟”带进了漫画世界！并且只有当他代替漫画世界里的主角成为所谓的“player排行No.1”，他才能回到现实世界。菜鸟玩家该如何成为最强玩家呢？

altTitles.ja: モブサイコ100

description.en: Mob Psycho 100 is the story about a young middle schooler, Shigeo Kageyama, nicknamed "Mob" living in Seasoning City. Ever since he was young, he has had astounding psychic powers. However, this esper power is unable to grant him the one thing he wishes for the most: to be friends with the girl he likes in his class.
description.ja:
何かが「100」になったとき、爆発する少年モブ。
外見はいたって普通ーというよりむしろ地味。場の空気を読むのが苦手な彼は、実は強力な超能力の持ち主だった。
そんな彼の能力に目をつけ、次々と現れるニセ霊能力者に宗教団体、不良番長、謎の秘密組織・・・。
フツーの青春を願うモブに、平穏な日は訪れるのか？
description.ru: Кагэяма Сигэо, также известный как «Моб», восьмиклассник с психическими способностями. Он мог сгибать ложки и поднимать вещи силой мысли с ранних лет, но затем стал постепенно сдерживаться от использования способностей на публике. Теперь, единственное, чего он хочет — подружиться с девочкой из класса, Цубоми. Вместе со своим психическим «наставником», он продолжает повседневную жизнь, пытаясь понять свое назначение в жизни.
description.pt-br: Kageyama Shigeo (ou "Mob") é um estudante do 8º ano com habilidades psíquicas. Desde pequeno, ele é capaz de entortar colheres e fazer objetos levitarem usando sua mente, mas, aos poucos, passou a evitar usar suas habilidades em público devido à atenção negativa que recebia. Agora, a única coisa que ele quer é se tornar amigo de uma garota de sua classe, Tsubomi. Junto com seu "mentor psíquico" (que não tem poderes psíquicos), ele continua sua vida cotidiana, tentando realizar seu objetivo de vida.

altTitles.es: Mis 100 Novias Que Me Quieren Mogollón Mogollón

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.es:
Rentaro Aijou es una máquina de declararse y de recibir calabazas, consiguiendo la cifra de 100 rechazos al final de la secundaria. Roto por dentro, va a rezar a un santuario de suerte en el amor para pedir que la fortuna le sonría. Para su sorpresa, el dios del santuario se le aparece y le promete que conocerá a 100 almas gemelas durante el bachillerato.

Aunque al principio cree que le ha tomado el pelo, el primer día de clase se le declaran dos chicas en cuanto lo conocen, así que ve que sus rezos funcionaron y la cosa pinta bien. Sin embargo, hay un pequeño detalle que el dios no le explicó: si alguna de estas almas gemelas no consigue establecer una relación con él, esa chica morirá. Su gran corazón hace que no pueda permitir que eso suceda en ningún caso y por eso, ¡decide que saldrá con todas ellas!

¡Su nueva e inesperada vida de bachillerato, llena de amor, confusiones y un montón de chicas, le depara una sorpresa tras otra!

(Fuente: Editorial Ivrea)
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

description.fr: Quand un ange est mis au défi de séduire un démon, celui-ci se voit vite être mis en déroute par plus puissant que lui...Venez à la rencontre de Métatron et de Mammon, et découvrez leur histoire infernale...

altTitles.es: La Chica Malvada Se Convierte En Emperatriz

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

Alternative Raws: [Kuaikan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27719)

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我成了反派大佬的小嬌妻？！

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

description.en:
Cooper, swordsmith, dyemaster, tatami stitcher, plasterer.
Stories about the skills and spirit of master craftsmen, portrayed in loving and faithful detail that lets you take a glance at the everyday lives of the artisans of the Edo period.

--------- 

*  Winner of the 2024 Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize, "New Creator Prize"

altTitles.ja: 異世界薬局

altTitles.th: เภสัชกรเทพสองโลก

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

description.en: One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...
A series of short oneshots from the author’s weibo about the misadventures of a sly house cat and an earnest hamster.
